channel.title: HUD Icon Error
channel.description:
Just a minor detail error, but for some reason the HUD icons for the grenade, satchel, and tripmine are stretched in the Steam version compared to the mod version. This is odd because all of the icons I have seen so far in the Steam (currently in Power Up chapter) don't look stretched at all.
[b][img]F:\Steam\steamapps\sourcemods\BMS\materials\VGUI[/img]Steam Version:[/size][/b][img]https://i.imgur.com/iAyAyR8.jpg[/img]
[b]Mod Version:[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/qrkbMxZ.jpg[/img][/size]

item.title: HUD Icon Error
item.dc:creator: Mr_GameCrazy
item.description:
Just a minor detail error, but for some reason the HUD icons for the grenade, satchel, and tripmine are stretched in the Steam version compared to the mod version. This is odd because all of the icons I have seen so far in the Steam (currently in Power Up chapter) don’t look stretched at all.

Steam Version:[/size]

1920×1080

Mod Version:
